Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Logan Square
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes such as, the #56 Milwaukee route, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
